stories.Title: A successful flight for Virgin Galactic
stories.Description: Yesterday, a dream that took decades to materialize finally came true. The company's first commercial suborbital mission signals a groundbreaking shift in the landscape of private space travel.
stories.Tweet: A successful flight for Virgin Galactic 📦 Yesterday, a dream that took decades to materialize finally came true. The company's first commercial suborbital mission signals a groundbreaking shift in the landscape of private space travel. #virgingalactic https://spacenews.com/virgin-galactic-completes-first-commercial-spaceshiptwo-suborbital-flight/

stories.Title: Windows Copilot is here for public testers
stories.Description: Copilot, Microsoft's AI assistant for Windows 11, is now available for preview. Enhance your experience with its AI-powered features. Chat, create images, and control your settings effortlessly.
stories.Tweet: Windows Copilot is here for public testers 📦 Copilot, Microsoft's AI assistant for Windows 11, is now available for preview. Enhance your experience with its AI-powered features. Chat, create images, and control your settings effortlessly. #microsoft https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/06/windows-11s-copilot-brings-ai-chat-to-desktops-in-first-public-preview/

stories.Title: Embracing the power of AI in medicine
stories.Description: Insilico Medicine makes history with the first fully generative AI drug to enter human clinical trials. Taking a significant step forward in treating idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis.
stories.Tweet: Embracing the power of AI in medicine 📦 Insilico Medicine makes history with the first fully generative AI drug to enter human clinical trials. Taking a significant step forward in treating idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis. #ai https://www.cnbc.com/2023/06/29/ai-generated-drug-begins-clinical-trials-in-human-patients.html

stories.Title: EU's AI regulation sparks controversy
stories.Description: Leading figures from companies like Airbus and Meta raise concerns about the legislation's impact on Europe's competitiveness and investment.
stories.Tweet: EU's AI regulation sparks controversy 📦 Leading figures from companies like Airbus and Meta raise concerns about the legislation's impact on Europe's competitiveness and investment. #ai https://edition.cnn.com/2023/06/30/tech/eu-companies-risks-ai-law-intl-hnk

stories.Title: No more learning, it's time to unlearn
stories.Description: Google has recently launched the Machine Unlearning Challenge, inspiring participants to develop efficient algorithms for removing specific training examples.
stories.Tweet: No more learning, it's time to unlearn 📦 Google has recently launched the Machine Unlearning Challenge, inspiring participants to develop efficient algorithms for removing specific training examples. #ai https://ai.googleblog.com/2023/06/announcing-first-machine-unlearning.html?

stories.Title: Salesforce's latest AI push
stories.Description: Sales GPT and Service GPT are AI-powered tools aimed at transforming sales and service workflows, by harnessing the power of Salesforce's own Einstein GPT.
stories.Tweet: Salesforce's latest AI push 📦 Sales GPT and Service GPT are AI-powered tools aimed at transforming sales and service workflows, by harnessing the power of Salesforce's own Einstein GPT. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/salesforce-launches-sales-gpt-service-gpt-to-ease-customer-interactions-through-generative-ai/

stories.Title: Tour de France gets a touch of AI
stories.Description: NTT, the official partner, is transforming the race with the integration of ChatGPT and AI-Powered solutions that will enhance the fan viewing experience.

stories.Title: NACS revolution continues
stories.Description: Electrify America and Blink have announced the integration of NACS connectors, enabling Tesla drivers and NACS-compatible EVs to charge at their stations without the need for an adapter.
stories.Tweet: NACS revolution continues 📦 Electrify America and Blink have announced the integration of NACS connectors, enabling Tesla drivers and NACS-compatible EVs to charge at their stations without the need for an adapter. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/06/29/electrify-america-blink-tesla-nacs-connector-ev-chargers/

stories.Title: Tesla's winning quarter
stories.Description: The automaker is expected to announce a remarkable 445,000 global deliveries for the second quarter, signaling steady growth and strong market demand.
stories.Tweet: Tesla's winning quarter 📦 The automaker is expected to announce a remarkable 445,000 global deliveries for the second quarter, signaling steady growth and strong market demand. #tesla https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/tesla-set-report-record-quarterly-vehicle-deliveries-fueled-by-incentives-2023-06-30/

stories.Title: Euclid meets the dark universe
stories.Description: A fascinating adventure into the unknown begins tomorrow aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket, as Europe's Euclid telescope takes on the cosmic quest to understand dark matter and dark energy.
stories.Tweet: Euclid meets the dark universe 📦 A fascinating adventure into the unknown begins tomorrow aboard a SpaceX Falcon 9 rocket, as Europe's Euclid telescope takes on the cosmic quest to understand dark matter and dark energy. #space https://www.space.com/euclid-solving-mystery-dark-universe
